title: Box alignment for block, absolutely positioned, and table layouts
summary: The box alignment specification details how alignment works in various layout methods. In this page we explore how box alignment works in the context of block layout, including floated, positioned, and table elements. As this page aims to detail things which are specific to block layout and box alignment, it should be read in conjunction with the main box alignment page, which details the common features of box alignment across layout methods.
